Text: McKinsey alum Cc Mr Jeff Skilling CEO President and COO Enron Houston TX June Dear Jeff I worked at McKinsey NYFI during and have since founded and run an IT systems integration company called Techna in Silicon Valley with clients worldwide and Purnendu PC Chatterjee ex McK and affiliated with Soros funds as an equity partner We have been working closely with Sempra Energy trading for the past couple of years and are beginning an engagement with NYMEX soon Our president Ben Bernstein ex Microsoft has been managing these clients on the east coast personally Ben and I feel that we have interesting ideas in IT for Enron from our experience in this industry thus far and would appreciate your indulgence in getting us in touch with the appropriate IT leaders at Enron for us to make a pitch Your achievements at Enron since leaving McKinsey have deservedly won you quite a fan following As an unabashed member of this group I would love to hear from you anyway when you find a moment in your busy day Best regards Alo Dr Alo Ghosh CEO Techna Kifer Road Sunnyvale CA USA Telephone Facsimile Website wwwtechnacom
